channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - Databases

item.title: SAI and N-O-SQL
item.description:
Yesterday (argh, the day before yesterday) I went to a SAI conference on nosql. In Belgium, SAI is a non-profit organization for IT people which focuses on knowledge sharing.

The conference that day was on nosql. The presentation given by OuterThought was very good and offered a nice introduction to …
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen

item.title: Switching to database architecture
item.description: It's finally committed: I'm going to dive into the realms of database architecture. It's with some sentiment that I'm leaving the expertise field of Apache, J(2)EE and WebSphere, but seeing the database architecture field makes it up well. I'm starting to get acquainted with Oracle DB as first …
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
